full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/18/2023 3 358012 ALIEN REGISTRATION Name LEE YOH HAN STATEMENT OF FACTS FOR PREPARATION OF PETITION We No. A - 17 182 973 SECTION OF LAW6) (1) My full, true, and correct name is (2) YOH HAN (Full, true name, without abbreviations) (2) My present place of residence is 3426 VINTON AVE APT 3 WLA CALIF 90034 (Number and street) (City or town) (County) (State) (ZIP Code) (3) I was born on JAN 09 1914 SHANGHAI in CHINA (Month) (Day) (Year) (City or town) (County, district, province, or State) (Country) (4) I Married am and have SIX living children. The first name of my husband or wife is (was) MING ; (Single; married; divorced; widowed) we were married on DEC 02 1935 at SHANGHAI CHINA the or she was born (Month) (Day) (Year) (City or town) (State or country) KIANGSI at CHINA on May 05 1917 ; (City or town) (County. district, province, or State) (Country) (Month) (Day) (Year) entered the United States at NEW YORK N.Y. on April 21 1968 for permanent residence in (City or town) (State) (Month) (Day) (Year) with me the United States and now resides apart from me at ; and was naturalized (Show full address if not living with you) on Aug 04 72 at Los Angeles Calif Certificate No. C2065193 (passport) (Month) (Day) (Year) (City or town) (State) or became a citizen by ; his or her Alien Registration No. is 5-8-69 (5) I was lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence on Apr 21 1968 ; under the name (Month) (Day) (Year) of LEE YOH HAN at New York los on the TWA sec 245 (City) (State) (Name of vessel or other means of I (6) I have resided continuously in the United States of America since 1968 and continuously in the State of California where I now live since 1968 and during the past 5 years I have been physically present in the United States for an aggregate period of months. (7) I (have, have not) previously filed petition for naturalization No. None on (Month) (Day) (Year) at in the (City) (State) - (8) I wish the naturalization court to change my name to (Give full name desired or state "None") (9) Since such lawful admission, I have not been absent from the United States (for a period or periods of 6 months or longer) except as follows (if none, state "None") : None DEPARTED FROM THE UNITED STATES RETURNED TO THE UNITED STATES DATE VESSEL OR OTHER-MEANS DATE VESSEL OR OTHER MEANS PORT PORT (Month, day, year) OF CONVEYANCE (Month, day, year) OF CONVEYANCE (10) I have Six children: (Complete columns (a) to (h) as to each child. If child lives with you, state "with me" in column (h), otherwise (No.) give city and State of child's residence.)
